column4: I just installed ubuntu 6.06 (linux super beginner) and the sound does not work. I have looked online, but I cant figure it out. Any ideas?
pastebin is taking some time, i dont know why
i tried it, but there is still no sound
still nothing, the sound worked before, but I had to do something to it I remember, then I reinstalled Linux, and it doesnt work again
I dont know what it is, i will just try to get it figured out tomorrow
thanks though, i appreciate the help, night
oh well, tomorrow ill be back
